## Installation & Usage
### pip install

If the python package is hosted on Github, you can install directly from Github

```sh
pip install git+https://github.com/GIT_USER_ID/GIT_REPO_ID.git
```
(you may need to run `pip` with root permission: `sudo pip install git+https://github.com/GIT_USER_ID/GIT_REPO_ID.git`)

Then import the package:
```python
import toshl_swagger_client 
```

### Setuptools

Install via [Setuptools](http://pypi.python.org/pypi/setuptools).

```sh
python setup.py install --user
```
(or `sudo python setup.py install` to install the package for all users)

Then import the package:
```python
import toshl_swagger_client
```

## Getting Started

Please follow the [installation procedure](#installation--usage) and then run the following:

```python
from __future__ import print_function
import time
import toshl_swagger_client
from toshl_swagger_client.rest import ApiException
from pprint import pprint

# Configure HTTP basic authorization: auth
configuration = toshl_swagger_client.Configuration()
configuration.username = 'YOUR_USERNAME'
configuration.password = 'YOUR_PASSWORD'

# create an instance of the API class
api_instance = toshl_swagger_client.AccountsApi(toshl_swagger_client.ApiClient(configuration))
acct_id = 56 # int | Numeric ID of the account to get

try:
    # Account
    api_response = api_instance.account(acct_id)
    pprint(api_response)
except ApiException as e:
    print("Exception when calling AccountsApi->account: %s\n" % e)

```
